channel.title: CVE Feed for Siretta -- QUARTZ-GOLD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siretta -- QUARTZ-GOLD

item.title: CVE-2022-40985|2024-08-03T12:28:42.944Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the '(ddns1|ddns2) hostname WORD' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-41014|2024-08-03T12:28:42.938Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no static dhcp mac WORD (WORD|null) ip A.B.C.D hostname (WORD|null) description (WORD|null)' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-41007|2024-08-03T12:28:43.026Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'port redirect protocol (tcp|udp|tcp/udp) inport <1-65535> dstaddr A.B.C.D export <1-65535> description WORD' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-40222|2024-08-03T12:14:39.927Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41006|2024-08-03T12:28:43.057Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no ip static route destination A.B.C.D gateway A.B.C.D mask A.B.C.D metric <0-10> interface (lan|wan|vpn) description WORD' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-38715|2024-08-03T11:02:14.519Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A leftover debug code vulnerability exists in the httpd shell.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41022|2024-08-03T12:28:43.021Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no vpn l2tp advanced name WORD dns (yes|no) mtu <128-16384> mru <128-16384> auth (on|off) password (WORD|null) options WORD' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-41154|2024-08-03T12:35:49.460Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary file deletion. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40988|2024-08-03T12:28:42.944Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold

A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'ipv6 static dns WORD WORD WORD' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-42492|2024-08-03T13:10:41.009Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the m2m binary of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This command injection is reachable through the m2m's DOWNLOAD_AD command.

item.title: CVE-2022-41017|2024-08-03T12:28:42.965Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'vpn basic protocol (l2tp|pptp) name WORD server WORD username WORD passsword WORD firmwall (on|off) defroute (on|off) localip A.B.C.D' command template.

item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'firmwall srcmac (WORD|null) srcip (A.B.C.D|null) dstip (A.B.C.D|null) protocol (none|tcp|udp|icmp) srcport (<1-65535>|null) dstport (<1-65535>|null) policy (drop|accept) description (WORD|null)' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-41026|2024-08-03T12:35:47.892Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no vpn pptp advanced name WORD dns (yes|no) mtu <128-16384> mru <128-16384> mppe (on|off) stateful (on|off) options WORD' command template.

A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'vpn schedule name1 WORD name2 WORD policy (failover|backup) description (WORD|null)' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-38451|2024-08-03T10:54:03.887Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd update.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no schedule link1 WORD link2 WORD policy (failover|backup) description (WORD|null)' command template.

A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'vpn basic protocol (l2tp|pptp) name WORD server WORD username WORD passsword WORD firmwall (on|off) defroute (on|off)' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-40220|2024-08-03T12:14:39.961Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd txt/restore.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no gre index <1-8> tunnel A.B.C.D source (A.B.C.D|null) dest A.B.C.D keepalive (on|off) interval (<0-255>|null) retry (<0-255>|null) description (WORD|null)' command template.

item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'no vpn basic protocol (l2tp|pptp) name WORD server WORD username WORD passsword WORD firmwall (on|off) defroute (on|off) localip A.B.C.D' command template.

item.title: CVE-2022-41021|2024-08-03T12:28:42.964Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: Several stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the DetranCLI command parsing functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow is in the function that manages the 'vpn l2tp advanced name WORD dns (yes|no) mtu <128-16384> mru <128-16384> auth (on|off) password (WORD|null) options WORD' command template.
